column4: im pretty new to ubuntu and linux, does anyone have any experience with a 2.5" SSD for a laptop? looking to get one, wondering if it caused any problems or worked great. Thanks
Not enough details. It's a hard drive.  Also, lot of netbooks, computers, laptops, servers.  They all worked great for most cases.
I have an Acer Aspire 4730Z, I wanted to get the crucial 256gb SSD and 4gb ram set, just didnt know if it would have any compatibility issues
